Package game.dinosaurs

Class Brachiosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.DinoActor
game.dinosaurs.Brachiosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
public class Brachiosaur extends DinoActor
A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits from trees, can destroy bushes and cannot be attacked by Allosaur.

  • Constructor Details

    • Brachiosaur

      public Brachiosaur​(DinoCapabilities sex, Boolean isMatured)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      sex - DinoCapabilities.MALE is Brachiosaur should be male, DinoCapabilities.FEMALE is Brachiosaur should be female,
      isMatured - true if Brachiosaur is grown up, false otherwise.
